title: Krakenslayer
name: Hilda
summary: A seasoned and fearless monster hunter of the seas, Hilda is known for her unparalleled skill in slaying krakens and other maritime beasts. Her rugged demeanor and battle-hardened experience make her a formidable ally in any nautical adventure.
history: Hilda has spent years hunting dangerous sea creatures, accumulating a wealth of experience and numerous scars. Her body is adorned with tattoos commemorating her most significant kills, each one a testament to her prowess as a hunter.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Tattoos on arms, chest, and neck

clothing.accessories: Gold ring earring, chain necklace with shark teeth

notes: Has numerous tattoos commemorating her kills
Known for her accent and occasional nautical idioms
